Description: Granodiorite block-statue of Amenhotep; eleven rows of text at front; plain back-pillar.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Abydos, Temple of Osiris, inside pylon of Tuthmosis III.
Curator's comments: Published: PM V: p. 43. Petrie, Abydos II: 36, 45, pls.32.11 and 36.2. HTBM Part 5: Plate 38. R. Schulz, Die Entwicklung und Bedeutung des Kuboiden Statuentypus, 34 (1992). [pl.97] and Volume 33 p.374.
